ygData.subject: Re: Gnome Necro!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... dont know about that part.  you are accepted in neriak, but dying may be a big down point. i would get bound to the area if i were in your position trying
ygData.messageBody:
>Where is a good place for a level 5 Gnomish necro to fight at?

dont know about that part. you are accepted in neriak, but dying may be a
big down point. i would get bound to the area if i were in your position
trying that.

>Are Gnome necros accepted in Neriak to buy spells and whatnot? what about
>In the Necro guildhouse in Freeport?

i THINK they are accepted in neriak. ive heard in third gate (the deepest
zone in neriak) non-tier'dal might get attacked by guards; also there are
3-4 ghouls guarding the lodge of the dead (our guild house) that may KoS you
also. im not sure- being a tier'dal, these are just things ive heard/read.

>Gnome necros arent KoS in Freeport are they?

i would stay far away from the wizard guild there, ive been KoS there a few
times (i didnt know the city and turned the wrong corner. check the map in
the manual, and dont go near the T intersection closest to it). also, stay
out of N freeport. ive been KoS there also, and that is where the
goody-goodies hang out (paladins and their type).

belphenor
lodge of the dead
neriak, fennin ro
